lessonSubtitleText: Test how well you know this story

questions.text: What problem did Mary have at the wedding?
answers: The guests did not show up

questions.text: What did Jesus say to Mary?
answers: My time has not yet come

questions.text: What did Jesus tell the servants to do?
What happened to the water? What did the party master say?
answers: It turned into wine; he said it was the best
It stayed water; he was confused
It tasted terrible; he was angry
It became juice; he was disappointed

questions.text: What did Jesus' disciples do after seeing this miracle?
answers: They asked for some more wine

questions.text: What happened as Jesus and the disciples crossed the Sea of Galilee?
What was Jesus doing during the storm?
What did Jesus do after the disciples woke him up?
answers: Told the storm to be quiet and it obeyed
Helped the disciples row the boat

questions.text: What did the disciples say after Jesus calmed the storm?
answers: Who is this? Even the wind and waves obey him!
The storm was not that bad

questions.text: Why does the Bible call Jesus' miracles 'signs'?
answers: They show us that Jesus is the Son of God
